guest.name: Raaz Herzberg
guest.title: Chief Marketing Officer & VP of Product Strategy
guest.background: Raaz is the CMO and VP of Product Strategy at Wiz, the fastest-growing software company in history. Previously, she was a product leader at Microsoft managing Azure Sentinel and was one of the first 10 employees at Wiz, transitioning from engineering to product to marketing leadership.
guest.background_zh: Raaz 现任 Wiz 的首席营销官兼产品战略副总裁，Wiz 是历史上增长最快的软件公司。此前，她是微软 Azure Sentinel 的产品负责人，也是 Wiz 的前十号员工，职业生涯经历了从工程到产品再到市场营销领导岗位的跨越。

episodeSummary: Raaz Herzberg shares the inside story of Wiz's pivot from a failed idea to reaching $100M ARR in 18 months through intense customer validation. She discusses the transition from product to marketing, emphasizing why product leaders often fail at marketing due to the "curse of knowledge," and introduces frameworks for detecting true product-market fit versus polite interest. The conversation covers organizational culture, the strategic use of friction in sales, and how to spot where the "heat" is in a scaling company.
episodeSummary_zh: Raaz Herzberg 分享了 Wiz 从一个失败的创意转型，并在18个月内通过高强度的客户验证达到 1 亿美元 ARR 的内幕故事。她探讨了从产品到市场的转型，强调了产品负责人因“知识诅咒”而在营销上屡屡受挫的原因，并提出了区分真实 PMF 与礼貌性兴趣的框架。对话涵盖了组织文化、销售中的“战略性摩擦力”运用，以及如何识别高速增长公司中的“重心（Heat）”所在。
